name: Rhythm Wizard
description:
Rhythm Wizard 2 Player Competitive Rhythm Game

-----------------------------------------------------

Battle each other by casting and defending spells to the Rhythm of the song

  • The attacks changes depends on the spells you cast as the notes hit the circle
  • The opponent will have to defend by casting the same spells on defense
  • The screen shifts in favour of the player with the higher HP
  • Charge ultimate by hitting the notes accurately
  • Cast ultimate by holding down the ultimate button and choose your desire spell

-----------------------------------------------------

Ultimates Abilities

  • Red: Consecutive attacks
  • Blue: Fortified Defences
  • Yellow: Blind the opponent's screen
